pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.1: _Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū_ can be read either as referring to two monks, Mettiya and Bhūmajaka, or as a group of monks led by these two. I have not been able to find any clear evidence that it refers to a group, and so I prefer the more straightforward reading that it only refers to the two monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.7.21: For the rendering of _saṅghāṭi_ as “upper robe”, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
